usage: Estrutura do músculo cardíaco com discos intercalados
alt: The top left panel of this figure shows the cross structure of cardiac muscle with the major parts labeled. The top right panel shows a micrograph of cardiac muscle. The bottom panel shows the structure of intercalated discs.

usage: Vista frontal do coração com partes principais
alt: This image shows the anterior view of the frontal section of the heart with the major parts labeled.

usage: Potencial de ação cardíaco - mudança no potencial de membrana
alt: This graph shows the change in membrane potential as a function of time.
